Title: Gordons
Writer: Jenji Kohan (created by), Vera Santamaria, Anthony Natoli (story editor), Merritt Tierce (staff writer)
Actors: Taylor Schilling, Natasha Lyonne, Uzo Aduba, Danielle Brooks
Plot: Taystee gets fan mail -- and an assist from an old friend. Piper lobbies Luschek to bring back kickball. Aleida tries out a new sales tactic.
